thread.title: This Is the Most Popular Muffin Recipe on Pinterest — On Trend
thread.title_full: This Is the Most Popular Muffin Recipe on Pinterest — On Trend

author: Ariel Knutson
title: This Is the Most Popular Muffin Recipe on Pinterest — On Trend
text:
(Image credit: Ambitious Kitchen ) 
Waking up to freshly baked muffins is a joy. It's basically a "healthier" cupcake (sometimes) that we get to eat for breakfast. There are so many muffin recipes to make your mornings way better, so how do you decide which one to go after next? The internet has some ideas for you to try out. Here's the most popular muffin recipe on Pinterest — it's essentially a classic recipe with some wholesome tweaks. Have you tried it? (Image credit: Ambitious Kitchen ) 
The most popular muffin recipe on Pinterest is this banana chocolate chip muffin from Ambitious Kitchen. They have been pinned 1,800,000 times. That's a lot. In fact, it's one of the most popular baked good recipes on the entire platform this year. On Ambitious Kitchen's website, the recipe has received over 200 comments. 
See it on Pinterest: 30 Minute Skinny Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins from Ambitious Kitchen 
Like the recipe title suggests, this banana chocolate chip muffin gets a healthy makeover from Ambitious Kitchen. The muffins use ingredients like whole-wheat pastry flour, olive oil, Greek yogurt, and unsweetened almond milk. Instead of using granulated sugar, the recipe calls for honey.
